title: Mark Howard
deck:
I’m Mark and I'm a Trustee of Gateway Church (that’s the legal Charity Commission bit of things). I'm married to Georgina and we have 3 grown up children and 4 grandchildren, who think my camera is a part of me!

I work in York for Aviva, and spend a lot of my “spare” time running! But I’m built for comfort, not for speed. I’ve also got a practical streak, and have been known to do a bit of gardening and DIY.
